Mark of the Kindred.name: Mark of the Kindred
Mark of the Kindred.blurb: Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basic abilities. Every 4 hunts completed also increases Kindred's basic attack range.
Mark of the Kindred.description: Innate: Both Lamb and Wolf mark targets to hunt. Scoring a  takedown on a marked target permanently empowers Kindred's abilities, as well as granting Lamb 75 − 250 (based on Marks)  bonus range on her basic attacks and abilities.
Mark of the Kindred.description2: Innate - Lamb: Lamb is offered a selection of  champions to take down, which is hidden while in combat with an enemy champion. Once selected, there's an 8 seconds delay before the Mark can be collected, and Lamb can change her target if the target hasn't died during a period of time. Targets successfully hunted cannot be targeted again for a few minutes.
Mark of the Kindred.description3:
Innate - Wolf: Starting at 3:15, Wolf periodically selects a monster camp within the enemy's jungle based on Lamb's current Marks for 180 seconds:
 0 :  Rift Scuttler
 1 – 3:  Rift Scuttler,  Crimson Raptor,  Gromp
 4 – 7:  Ancient Krug,  Blue Sentinel,  Greater Murk Wolf, or  Red Brambleback
 8 + :  Rift Herald or  Baron Nashor,  Dragon or  Elder Dragon

Wolf will select another monster camp 40 seconds after killing a marked monster. If an ally kills a hunted jungle monster within 6 seconds of Kindred damaging it, Kindred will still acquire the stack.
The marked camp is highlighted on the minimap to both teams. The mark is removed when the camp is cleared even if Kindred are not involved.

Dance of Arrows.name: Dance of Arrows
Dance of Arrows.blurb: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.
Dance of Arrows.description: Active: Lamb  dashes in the target direction, gaining 25% (+ 5% per  Mark) bonus attack speed for 4 seconds while firing up to three arrows to nearby  visible targets, dealing physical damage. Lamb's current attack target at any proximity will be prioritized by one of the arrows.
Dance of Arrows.description2: Casting  Wolf's Frenzy or dashing while inside the area will change Dance of Arrows'  cooldown into a static cooldown.
Dance of Arrows.description3: Dance of Arrows resets Lamb's basic attack timer.

Wolf's Frenzy.name: Wolf's Frenzy
Wolf's Frenzy.blurb: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him.
Wolf's Frenzy.description: Passive: As Kindred move and attack, they build up to 100 stacks of Hunter's Vigor. At full stacks, Lamb's next basic attack  restores up to  32 − 100 (based on level) health, based on Kindred's missing health.
Wolf's Frenzy.description2: Active: Wolf  dashes to the target location and claims the surrounding area as his territory for the next 8.5 seconds, separating from Lamb. Wolf autonomously attacks enemies within the area, prioritizing Lamb's attack target.
Wolf's Frenzy.description3: Wolf's basic attacks deal magic damage and scale with 25% of Kindred's bonus attack speed. Against monsters, Wolf deals 50% increased damage and his attacks  slow his target by 50% for 2 seconds.
Wolf's Frenzy.leveling3:
Magic Damage:
25 / 30 / 35 / 40 / 45 (+ 20% bonus AD) (+ 1.5% (+ 1% per  Mark) of target's current health)
Wolf's Frenzy.description4: Wolf's Frenzy ends immediately if Lamb leaves the area.
Wolf's Frenzy.notes:
* Applies  persistent damage in an  area of effect range.
 Wolf is  untargetable,  invulnerable and  ghosted, but cannot move through terrain other than the initial dash on activation. 
 Wolf is not able to re-target  Rift Scuttler if he loses  sight of it while he's attacking it.

Mounting Dread.name: Mounting Dread
Mounting Dread.blurb: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.
Mounting Dread.description: Active: Lamb cripples the target unit,  slowing them by 50% for 1 second.
Mounting Dread.description2: If Lamb manages to basic attack the target twice with no longer than 4 seconds between each attack after casting Mounting Dread, her third attack within the following 4 seconds directs Wolf to pounce the target, dealing bonus physical damage, capped against  monsters at 300 bonus damage.
Mounting Dread.leveling2:
Bonus Physical Damage:
80 / 100 / 120 / 140 / 160 (+ 80% bonus AD) (+ 8% (+ 0.5% per  Mark) of target's missing health)
Mounting Dread.description3: Wolf's pounce will  critically strike for (50% +  37.5%)  bonus physical damage against targets below 15% − 65% (based on critical strike chance) maximum health.

Lamb's Respite.name: Lamb's Respite
Lamb's Respite.blurb: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.
Lamb's Respite.description: Active: Lamb blesses the ground under herself for 4 seconds. While inside the area, all units  cannot be reduced below  10% their maximum health. Units in the area who reach the threshold cannot be healed for the remaining duration.
Lamb's Respite.description3: All units within the zone are  healed immediately when the blessing ends.
Lamb's Respite.notes: * Any given unit's  health regeneration will still be active while inside Lamb's Respite.
